snippet: Most vomiting scenes were once handled with a character’s discreet disappearance to another room. No more.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook deplores television trend of showing characters vomiting on screen; says such depictions amount to pointless and disgusting excess.
lead_paragraph: Most vomiting scenes were once handled with a character’s discreet disappearance to another room. No more.

headline.print_headline: Realism Splashing a Screen Near You
headline.main: Realism Splashing a Screen Near You
